forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. West southwest wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon sun paints a warm glow over Downtown San Francisco, casting gentle shadows that dance amid lively streets. With a high reaching the comfortable 69 degrees, soft winds from the west whisper through the city, ensuring a pleasant breeze that elevates the spirits of pedestrians drawn to the charm of the day. Although the warmth settles in, a serene clarity prevails, without the typical coastal fog impeding the views. The sky, a splendid canvas of blue with only mild wisps of clouds, hints at an inviting outdoor experience, devoid of the marine layer’s persistent cling.

As the evening descends, the atmosphere shifts. The clouds gather softly, holding the promise of a cool night with temperatures dipping to around 60. The mild breeze will continue its gentle caress, providing a refreshing contrast to the earlier warmth. Attire should remain versatile; layers of light sweaters or long-sleeved shirts will serve well, balancing comfort against the swift changes of day and night. For those seeking pastimes, consider strolling through a nearby park, immersing yourself in local art, or savoring a freshly brewed coffee on an inviting patio. The evening beckons an invitation to linger and savor the beauty that unfolds in this vibrant urban tapestry.
